channel.title: Nerd on 2D Steve
channel.description: Recent content in Nerd on 2D Steve

item.title: Shipping
item.description: I was really hoping to get my Moonlander keyboard today. UPS told me it would be here, only to let me down as the day dragged on.

item.title: Fresh Air
item.description: Welp, I did it. I finally decided to pick up a new laptop.

item.title: The Podman Quest
item.description: Okay, ya’ll. I have been watching a LOT of programming streams on Twitch and there is one theme that seems to be pretty constant between all of them: Docker is the thing.

item.title: Comments
item.description: I have spent the last couple days still day dreaming a bit on what to do with this blog and trying to get it to a pretty suitable replacement for Wordpress.

item.title: Short posts
item.description: I should post more short stuff. Like random thoughts and junk.

item.title: We Done Moved!
item.description: It was a whirlwind of a day, but I’ve officially moved my blog over to a static website.
